name: ANNE LAGARCE’S MERINGUE COOKIES
instructions: Cream butter with sugar and nuts.
Sift flour with salt and add slowly mixing well.
Wrap in wax paper and refrigerate overnight.
Take dough and roll between 2 sheets of waxed paper.
Place on greased and lightly floured cookie sheet.
With a spoon put meringue on cookie and spread out.
Bake at 350 for 12-15 minutes.  (Put sprinkles on before baking).
Meringue – fold ½ cup sugar into stiffly beaten egg whites.
